x-codeSamples.label: javascript Axios

parameters.name: composed-of
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the research definition

parameters.name: context-type-quantity
parameters.description: A use context type and quantity- or range-based value assigned to the research definition

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the research definition

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The research definition publication date

parameters.name: depends-on
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: derived-from
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the research definition

parameters.name: effective
parameters.description: The time during which the research definition is intended to be in use

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External identifier for the research definition

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the research definition

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the research definition

parameters.name: predecessor
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the research definition

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the research definition

parameters.name: successor
parameters.description: What resource is being referenced

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the research definition

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Topics associated with the ResearchDefinition

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the research definition

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the research definition
